com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.print

Class PrintSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.print.PrintSetup

  • public class PrintSetup
extends Object
    A utility class for specifying the decorative elements of the printout: the header (title and logo), and the footer (left, center, right text). The text used for the footer can include variable names that will be substituted when the Gantt chart gets printed, e.g. date and time, page number.
    Since:
    2.1
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann
    See Also:
    AbstractGanttChart.setPrintSetup(PrintSetup), DualGanttChart.setSecondaryPrintSetup(PrintSetup)

      PrintSetup()
      Default constructor.

      • setCenterFooter

        public void setCenterFooter(String text)
        Specifies a text (optional) to be displayed in the center of the footer. The variables $USER, $DATE, $TIME, $PAGE_NUMBER, $PAGE_TOTAL can be used for inserting actual values.
        Parameters:
        text - the text shown in the center of the footer
        Since:
        2.1

      • setFooterVisible

        public void setFooterVisible(boolean v)
        Specifies whether the printout should show a footer with a title and / or a logo.
        Parameters:
        v - if TRUE the FOOTER will be shown
        Since:
        2.1

      • setHeaderVisible

        public void setHeaderVisible(boolean v)
        Specifies whether the printout should show a header with a title and / or a logo.
        Parameters:
        v - if TRUE the header will be shown
        Since:
        2.1
